aiEnthusiast.title: Lead Software Engineer | Agentic AI, RAG & LLM Orchestration
descriptions: Lead Software Engineer at Open Innovation, specializing in RAG, Agents, and Agentic Development. I design and deliver production-ready AI systems that integrate LLMs with enterprise data, enabling autonomous, multi-step reasoning and workflow automation.

Based in Abu Dhabi, UAE. Over 10 years of experience in Python, SaaS platforms, AI-first architectures, and cloud infrastructure. Proven leader in mentoring teams, scaling systems, and driving measurable business impact through AI.

jobs.title: Lead Software Engineer
mission: • Leading AI-focused projects with emphasis on RAG pipelines, agent-based systems, and LLM integrations.
• Designed and delivered APIs with FastAPI and Flask, enabling smooth orchestration of agent workflows and enterprise data integrations.
• Built frameworks that allow agents to reason, interact with tools, and perform multi-step workflows in production environments.
• Improved knowledge applications by combining LLMs with structured data sources, enhancing reliability and accuracy.
• Mentored developers in AI-first engineering practices and guided adoption of scalable, production-ready approaches.
Stack: Python, FastAPI, Flask, LangChain, OpenAI, RAG, Docker, AWS, CI/CD

jobs.title: Lead Python Engineer / Technical Lead
mission: • Directed development of SaaS-based E-commerce solutions for major retailers including Spinneys, Waitrose, and Choithrams.
• Key contributor to the Kmmrce SaaS platform, driving significant growth in client online sales.
• Designed and implemented RESTful APIs and integrated multiple payment gateways.
• Promoted test-driven development (TDD) and conducted code reviews to maintain quality.
• Oversaw production releases and collaborated with cross-functional teams (frontend, UX, product) to deliver user-focused features.
Stack: Python, Django, Django Oscar, SaaS, REST APIs, Payment Gateways, AWS, CI/CD

jobs.title: Project Lead Developer
mission: • Developed and launched a payment gateway solution widely adopted by eCommerce platforms.
• Oversaw deployments on AWS, ensuring scalability and fault tolerance.
• Designed workflows for invoicing, order management, and delivery operations, improving efficiency.
• Built dashboards for merchants and logistics companies, enabling real-time monitoring and insights.
• Developed a customizable Django-based storefront app, empowering merchants to design unique online stores.
Stack: Python, Django, AWS, Payment Integrations, Dashboards, SaaS

jobs.title: Data Engineer
mission: • Contributed to data engineering projects and proofs-of-concept, focusing on warehouse design and ETL processes.
• Built pipelines using Sqoop, Hive, Impala, Presto, and Spark, with AWS Redshift as the data warehouse.
• Implemented Spark-based data cleansing, improving accuracy and performance.
• Migrated legacy AS400 iSeries logic to AWS Redshift, streamlining data workflows.
Stack: Spark, Hive, Impala, Presto, Sqoop, AWS Redshift, ETL
